name: IB_MESSAGES_3
description: The IB_MESSAGES_3 table contains basic information about In Basket messages.

columns.name: MSG_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the task record.

columns.name: CHART_CORR_ID
columns.description: The Unique Chart Correction record ID associated with this In Basket message.

columns.name: FAX_RECV_SMT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the submitter record that is associated with this record for failed fax messages.

columns.name: FAX_RECV_SMT_ID_RECORD_NAME
columns.description: The name of the submitter record.

columns.name: FAX_RECV_PT_RQG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the requisition grouper record that is associated with this record for failed fax messages.

columns.name: COMMUNICATION_CSN
columns.description: This is the contact serial number (CSN) of the linked communication.

columns.name: CVG_ID
columns.description: This item will be used to store the coverage ID for which a member's coverage-level PCP has been added.

columns.name: CONTRIBUTE_TO_RESULTNOTE_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether a message contributed to a result note

columns.name: PAT_REM_LIST_ID
columns.description: This associates a Patient Reminder with a Patient Reminder List.

columns.name: REPLY_TO_MSG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the message this message was a reply to.

columns.name: PARENT_MSG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the parent In Basket message for this row. If the message for this row was not generated by a different message, this column will be null.

columns.name: QUESTIONNAIRE_FORM_ID
columns.description: Stores questionnaire for initiate calls message

columns.name: QUESTIONNAIRE_FORM_ID_FORM_NAME
columns.description: The name of the form associated with the questionnaire.

columns.name: REASON_FOR_CALL_RFV_ID
columns.description: Stores reason for call attached to in basket message.

columns.name: REFILL_ERROR_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The type of e-prescribing interface error for refill request

columns.name: ABN_NOTE_ID
columns.description: Stores the linked ABN for which this In Basket message was generated.
